title: Axis Communications Autodesk Plugin AzureBlobRestAPI axiscontentfiles Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Axis Communications Autodesk Plugin. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the configuration of a cloud resource. The issue results from allowing unauthorized access to a storage account. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code on systems dependent on the cloud resource.
timeline:
2025-03-11 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2025-08-21 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2025-08-21 - Advisory Updated
credit: Nitesh Surana (@_niteshsurana) of Trend Micro Research
